name: StressReliefMusicSound
0:
”Alexa, play Stress Relief”
”Alexa, open Stress Relief”
”Alexa, start Stress Relief”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stress relief
des:
Stress Relief is a piano background music with calming tunes. It helps you to relieve stress and get a peaceful mind. It is also a great companion when you are reading, studying, working or meditating.


How to use "Stress Relief: Music Sound"?

You can say:
- "Alexa, open Stress Relief"
- "Alexa, start Stress Relief"
- "Alexa, play Stress Relief"

It will automatically play the sound indefinitely until you say "Alexa, stop".


How to set a timer?

First, you need to play the sound using one of the above method. Then, you can limit the time the sound will play by saying "Alexa, stop playing in 1 hour" (or however long you want it to last). Once 1 hour has passed, the sound will stop playing.


How to support us?

Your review is extremely important and it shows us your support. Please consider leaving a review if you love the skill. Your review encourages us to continue making more skills.


Listen to more relaxing sounds?

You can say "Alexa, open Stress Relief and send me other relaxing sounds" and the skill will send you an email containing other relaxing sounds you can try. It'll not only contain the name of the skill but also, contain direct link to the skill and you can enable it easily.

Or, you can search in the Alexa Skill store the following skills:
- Zen Spa
- Forest Birdsong
- Forest Birds
- Study Music
- Zen Meditation
- Beautiful Piano
- Forest Campfire
- Stress Relief
- Tropical Birds
- Waves Sandy Beach
